summary: The document is a memorandum from '12 Rayâ€™ 1960' to the Chief of the Finance Division, concerning the recruitment of Anerieo Rodriguez by the Habana Station. It specifies the financial details of Rodriguez's employment, including a monthly salary of $300.00 starting from 1 June 1960, to be deposited into Account No. 44-335-10L at the Whitney National Bank of New Orleans. The first deposit was planned for 30 June 1960, with subsequent monthly deposits until further instructions. The memorandum also notes that no taxes were to be withheld from the salary and lists the recipients of the document.
key_findings: Anerieo Rodriguez was recruited by the Habana Station with a monthly salary of $300.00, effective from 1 June 1960.
Salary deposits were to be made into Account No. 44-335-10L at the Whitney National Bank of New Orleans.
The initial deposit was scheduled for 30 June 1960, covering June's salary, followed by monthly deposits.
No taxes were to be deducted from Rodriguez's salary.
The memorandum included a distribution list for its recipients.
